headline: Why Deckers (DECK) Is Up 5.3% After Mixed Q4 Beat And Softer Full-Year Outlook – And What's Next
summary: In its most recent quarter, Deckers Outdoor reported US$1.43 billion in revenue, a 9.1% year-on-year increase that surpassed analyst expectations, with CEO Stefano Caroti citing double-digit growth at HOKA and UGG supported by strong international demand. However, softer full-year revenue guidance and weakness in direct-to-consumer sales contrasted with wholesale strength, raising questions about the quality and sustainability of the company’s growth mix. Next, we’ll examine how the strong...
